node.text:
While you holiday with us at The Raviz Kovalam, how about setting aside some time to answer the call of the mighty ocean. Scuba diving can easily be one of your most favorite thing to do on the planet. So no holding back on the underwater therapy people!

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
